title: (x) Mancini's Sleepworld - Octopuss {Richard Hards}
content:
Can anyone tell me the name of the typeface used for "Mancini's" in Mancini's SLEEPWORLD? Their logo can be found at [http://www.sleepworld.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071103183009/http:/www.sleepworld.com/)   
   
thanks for the help.
